######### DUT (Device Under Test) Information #########################

#### Wi-Fi Test Suite Control Agent Support ########
# 1-If DUT has Wi-Fi Test Suite Control Agent support. 0-If not supported.

WTS_ControlAgent_Support!1!


# Ability to send Discovery Request frames : 1 - if supported, 0 - if not supported
DiscoveryRequest_Support!1!

# DUT Band : ABG or BG or B (B only) or ABGN or GN
DUTBand!ABGN!

#Peer UAPSD Buffer STA sleep support : 1 - if supported, 0 - if not supported
PUAPSDSleepSTA_Support!0!

# WEP Support 0-No 1-Yes
WEP!1!

# WPA Support 0-No 1-Yes
WPA!1!
